The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Generation and characterization of the antibacterial activity of a novel hybrid antimicrobial peptide comprising functional domains from different insect cecropins.
Literature.Author: Plunkett RM, Murray SI, Lowenberger CA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Alcaligenes faecalis ATCC 8750(MIC=25-50µM),Citrobacter freundii ATCC 8090(MIC=0.781-1.563µM),Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 13048(MIC=0.098µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 11303(MIC=0.195-0.391µM),Pseudomonas fluorescens ATCC 13525(no activity data),Serratia marcescens ATCC 13880(no activity data),Bacillus coagulans ATCC 7050(MIC=3.125-6.25µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(no activity data),Lactococcus lactis ATCC 11454(MIC=1.563-3.125µM),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 4698(no activity data),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 14990(no activity data)
